name: zybel
description: AI/ML library in the making, all written in zig

releases.name: v0.0.3
releases.body:
Made another release today due to having completed easy matmul for these tensors


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Jafagervik/zybel/compare/v0.0.2...v0.0.3

releases.name: v0.0.2
releases.body:
**Great news!**: Most general ops for tensors are now supported. Still more 
to be done, but feeling hopeful about moving to more graph specific stuff


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Jafagervik/zinyn/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2
